formalpara.title: Data Center Permission Roles
formalpara.para: The table below describes the administrator roles and privileges applicable to data center administration.

table.title: Red Hat Virtualization System Administrator Roles

row.entry: Can use, create, delete, manage all physical and virtual resources within a specific data center except for storage, including clusters, hosts, templates and virtual machines.
Can configure and manage the network of a particular data center. A network administrator of a data center inherits network permissions for virtual machines within the data center as well.
